languages.text: "Этот еретик был больше, чем просто смутьяном. Он был генетической мерзостью, мутантом!"
"This heretic was not just a rabble-rouser. He was a genetic aberration, a mutant!"
languages.original_text: "Этот еретик был больше, чем просто смутьяном. Он был генетической мерзостью, мутантом!"

traits.locale_text: "This heretic was not just a rabble-rouser. He was a genetic anathema, a mutant!"

languages.text: «Este hereje no era solo un alborotador: era una abominación genética, ¡un mutante!».
languages.original_text: "This heretic was not just a rabble-rouser. He was a genetic aberration, a mutant!"

traits.locale_text: «Este hereje no era solo un alborotador: era una abominación genética, ¡un mutante!».

languages.text: 「この異端者はただの暴れん坊ではなかった。彼は忌まわしきもので、変異体でした！」
languages.original_text: "This heretic was not just a rabble-rouser. He was a genetic aberration, a mutant!"

traits.locale_text: 「この異端者はただの暴れん坊ではなかった。彼は忌まわしきもので、変異体でした！」

languages.text: “这个异端分子不仅仅是个煽动者！他是个变种人，是个基因怪物！”
languages.original_text: "This heretic was not just a rabble-rouser. He was a genetic aberration, a mutant!"

traits.locale_text: “这个异端分子不仅仅是个煽动者！他是个变种人，是个基因怪物！”

languages.text: "Dieser Ketzer war nicht einfach ein Unruhestifter. Er war eine genetische Abscheulichkeit, ein Mutant!"
languages.original_text: "This heretic was not just a rabble-rouser. He was a genetic aberration, a mutant!"

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Ketzer war nicht einfach ein Unruhestifter. Er war eine genetische Abscheulichkeit, ein Mutant!"

languages.text: « Plus qu'un simple agitateur, cet hérétique était une aberration génétique, un vil mutant ! »
languages.original_text: "This heretic was not just a rabble-rouser. He was a genetic aberration, a mutant!"

traits.locale_text: « Plus qu'un simple agitateur, cet hérétique était une aberration génétique, un vil mutant ! »

languages.text: "Bu kâfir, yalnızca ayaktakımını galeyana getirmedi. Aynı zamanda genetik bir sapkıydı, bir mutanttı!"
languages.original_text: "This heretic was not just a rabble-rouser. He was a genetic aberration, a mutant!"
